entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-James
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
